mapper.select: select * from tab_pb_unit_info where org_id = #{orgId} and del_flag = 0
select , ( select 1 from sys_dept d1 where d1.unit_id = u.unit_id and d1.dept_id = u.org_id ) as ifMaster from tab_pb_unit_info u where u.org_id = #{orgId} and u.del_flag = 0
mapper.update:
update tab_pb_unit_info set del_flag = 1 where unit_id in
${item}
mapper.select:
select
from tab_pb_unit_info where del_flag = 0
AND unit_name like concat(concat('%',#{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
